content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'exit': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows an object with a groove, oriented primarily toward the right side of the frame. The red circle (user's gaze) is at the bottom right of the object.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
